questions.question: Which of the following factors affects the moment of inertia of a flywheel?
How is the experimental moment of inertia of a flywheel determined?

answers.a: By measuring the rotational speed of the flywheel
answers.b: By measuring the force required to rotate the flywheel
answers.c: By measuring the angular acceleration of the flywheel
answers.d: By measuring the radius of the flywheel

questions.question: Which of the following is true about the moment of inertia of a flywheel?

answers.a: It increases as the mass of the flywheel increases
answers.b: It decreases as the radius of the flywheel decreases
answers.c: It is independent of the shape of the flywheel
answers.d: It is directly proportional to the speed of rotation of the flywheel
